import React, { Component } from "react"; //import Tilt from 'react-parallax-tilt'; import Tilt from 'react-tilt' const jikanjs = require('jikanjs'); class Otaku extends Component { /*constructor(props){ super(props); }*/ /*componentDidMount(){ jikanjs.loadUser('kyoharato', 'profile').then((response) => { this.setState({anime: response.anime_stats}); console.log(this.state.anime); }) .catch((err) => { console.error(err); // in case a error happens }) }*/ render() { return (

Anime, Donghua, Manga, Manhua & Manhwa. You name it, I love it 😌!

Anime

▹ # of Shows Watched : {this.props.anime.completed}

▹ # of Shows Watching : {this.props.anime.watching}

▹ # of Shows to Watch : {this.props.anime.plan_to_watch}

▹ # of Shows On Hold : {this.props.anime.on_hold}

▹ # of Shows Dropped : {this.props.anime.dropped}

▹ # of Episodes Watched : {this.props.anime.episodes_watched}

▹ Time Spent (hours) : {this.props.anime.days_watched*24 | 0}

Manga

▹ # of Manga Read : 10

▹ # of Manga Reading : 10

▹ # of Manga to Read : 10

▹ # of Manga On Hold : 10

▹ # of Manga Dropped : 10

); } } export default Otaku;
